mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reward_tb (project_id, reward_content, reward_point) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{content}, #{point})
mapper.select: SELECT r.reward_id, r.reward_content, r.reward_point, r.reward_quantity, COUNT(f.user_id) AS userCount, (r.reward_quantity - IFNULL(SUM(f.reward_quantity), 0)) AS remainingQuantity FROM reward_tb r LEFT JOIN funding_tb f ON r.reward_id = f.reward_id WHERE r.project_id = #{projectId} GROUP BY r.reward_id, r.reward_content, r.reward_point, r.reward_quantity;
mapper.update: update reward_tb set reward_content = #{rewardContent}, reward_point = #{rewardPoint} where project_id = #{projectId}
